interactions: m_c is convincing r_c1 that r_c2 isn't so bad once you get to know {PRONOUN/r_c2/object}.
m_c chats with r_c1 about how r_c2 is a nice cat.

r_c1 and r_c2 chatter quietly as they trail behind m_c, meowing softly to avoid catching {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} attention. 'Why do we always follow m_c like kits trailing after their mother?' they muse. As they express their vexation in whispers, m_c suddenly turns {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} head towards them, flashing a bright, sweet smile. Oh. The reason becomes clear, and the two cats blush embarrassingly as they realize why.
